channel.title: I need a antilag code for my server come on!
channel.description: Hey ! i need a non-lag code for my server ? got one ? or can u help me ? please ! i accept any help :)

item.title: I need a antilag code for my server come on!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:9, topic:181263”]furs make a new folder name anteLag.java then in there put this

public class anteLag() {

[size=10pt]use this now[/size]

public static int count = 0;
public boolean process() {
for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
while (p == null) {
count += 9762;
}
}
}
}[/quote]
Woah. Next time you want to try and be funny, do it the right way. The guy asked for help, not some code that someone thinks his funny.

1337haxaz:

Hey ! i need a non-lag code for my server ? got one ? or can u help me ? please ! i accept any help

If you want to reduce lag, the modern “anti-lag” codes are terrible, and don’t reduce lag at all. Minimization of lag can really only be achieved by well structured code, OOP, and a smart design for the server.

Sadly, these days, servers do not possess any of that.

Read full topic

public class anteLag() {

[size=3pt]dont try this[/size]

public static int count = 0;
public boolean process() {
for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
while (p == null) {
count += 9762;
}
}
}
}[/quote]

TY!!! Og btw delta can you tell me hoe to remove the object adding in devolution? in a pm
